title.narrative: Fiji - Fiji Elections Office Support &#38;#38; PSR

description.narrative: The Australian Civilian Corps (ACC) is a whole of government initiative that deploys civilian specialists to countries experiencing or emerging from natural disaster or conflict, specifically to support stabilisation, recovery and development training. Funding under this investment supports the deployment of one ACC specialist to work with the Government of Fiji for support to the Fiji Elections Office (FEO) in the areas of human resource management and public sector reform. The Australian Civilian Corps will deploy one specialist to support this work for the period of six months.
